<title level="1" right="Rules">[Volcanic Eruptions](/Rules.aspx?ID=2836)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 97 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Volcanic eruptions can contain any combination of ash, lava bombs, lava flows, pyroclastic flows, and vents.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<summary>
Volcanic eruptions can contain any combination of ash, lava bombs, lava flows, pyroclastic flows, and vents.
